short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep your audience focused on what matters. Show Pony allows you to highlight important content in your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Show Pony allows you to keep your audience focused during a screen share, presentation or other meetings involving content in a Chrome browser window. 

Click and drag to highlight the important information and the rest of the page is hidden behind a dark grey background. 

Show Pony can easily be toggled on and off by clicking the extension icon. 

Enjoy!
